plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/panel.Attention une trop grande plage de date: Warning: a too wide date range can take very long time to be calculated, or even will never be displayed

plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Aucun thermostat trouvé, cliquer sur \"A: No thermostat found, click on "Add" to start
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Choisir le mode de fonctionnement du mot: Choose the operating mode of the thermostat motor
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Actions que le thermostat est en mesure: Actions that the thermostat is able to perform in terms of heating and cooling
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Valeur de la consigne minimale qu'il est: Minimum setpoint value that can be transmitted to the thermostat
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Valeur de la consigne maximale qu'il est: Maximum setpoint value that can be transmitted to the thermostat
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Sélectionner la commande donnant la temp: Select the command giving the room temperature
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Température en dessous de laquelle une d: Temperature below which a heating failure is triggered
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Température au dessus de laquelle une dé: Temperature above which a heating failure is triggered
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Sélectionner la commande donnant la temp: Select the command giving the outside temperature (compulsory in Time mode)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Sélectionner la commande donnant la cons: Select the command giving the heating / air conditioning consumption per day in kilowatt-hours (optional)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Sélectionner une commande de votre choix: Select a command of your choice to display on the thermostat (optional)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Choisir les actions permettant de démarr: Choose the actions to start heating
Choose the actions to start cooling
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Choisir les actions permettant de tout a: Choose the actions to stop everything
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Choisir les actions à effectuer en cas d: Choose the actions to be performed in case of change of the thermostat setpoint temperature
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.(Confort, Eco, Hors-gel, Nuit, Jour, Abs: (Comfort, Eco, Frost protection, Night, Day, Absence, Holidays, etc ...)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.et définir les actions qui seront exécut: and define the actions that will be performed when entering each mode
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.avec une action sur la commande: with an action on the command
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.du plugin permettant de définir une tem: of the plugin allowing to define a setpoint temperature of
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Déclarer les ouvrants concernés par ce t: Declare the opening elements related to this thermostat
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.permettra de réguler la température en f: will regulate the temperature according to their condition
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Envoyer une alerte si un ouvrant défini: Send an alert if an opening defined here remains open for more than XX minutes
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Décider des actions à entreprendre en ca: Decide what to do if the temperature probe fails
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Une sonde est considérée défaillante sel: A probe is considered faulty according to the time between 2 temperature receptions defined in the tab
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Décider des actions à entreprendre en ca: Decide what actions to take in the event of a heating / air conditioning failure
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Le système de chauffage\/climatisation e: The heating / air conditioning system is considered faulty when the minimum or maximum temperatures defined on the tab
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.sont dépassées ou en fonction des marges: are exceeded or according to the failure margins defined in the tab
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Cron de répétition d'envoi des commandes: Cron for repeating the sending of commands (stop, heat, cool). Check to put in place if your thermostat does not start / stop correctly
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Cron de vérification des valeurs des son: Cron for checking the values of the temperature probes to set up if your thermostat does not start / stop correctly
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Délai maximal entre 2 changements de tem: Maximum time between 2 temperature changes before putting the thermostat in fault
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Permet d'adapter la chauffe en fonction: Allows to adapt the heating according to the internal contributions
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Permet d'adapter le refroidissement en f: Allows to adapt the cooling according to the internal contributions
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Déclenchement de la défaillance chaud pa: Heating failure triggered in relation to the difference between the temperature and the setpoint for 3 consecutive cycles (1 by default)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Déclenchement de la défaillance froid pa: Triggering of the cooling failure in relation to the difference between the temperature and the setpoint for 3 consecutive cycles (1 by default)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Cocher la case pour ne pas afficher la c: Check the box to not display the lock command on the widget
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Durée des cycles de chauffe\/climatisati: Duration of heating / cooling cycles (cannot be less than 15 minutes)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Pourcentage minimal de chauffe durant la: Minimum percentage of heating during the cycle time
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Pourcentage du cycle après lequel le rad: Percentage of cycle after which the radiator is considered hot
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Offset si le radiateur est chaud: Offset if the radiator is hot
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Offset à appliquer sur les cycles suivan: Offset to be applied on the following cycles when the radiator is considered hot
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Limiter les cycles marche\/arrêt et PID: Limit on / off and PID cycles
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Permet de maintenir la chauffe sur le cy: Allows heating to be maintained on the next cycle in the event of a short cycle (pellets, gas, fuel oil)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Correspond à l'écart entre la températur: Corresponds to the difference between the interior temperature and the setpoint for starting / stopping the thermostat
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Cocher la case pour que seule l'hystérés: Check the box so that only the positive hysteresis is taken into account for heating or cooling
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Permet de changer la direction en foncti: Used to change the direction according to the ratio between the setpoint and the outside temperature
Used to change the direction according to the ratio between the setpoint and the outside temperature)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Décocher la case pour désactiver l'auto-: Uncheck the box to disable self-learning (the coefficients below must therefore be entered manually)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Autoriser le thermostat à démarrer avant: Allow the thermostat to start before the time so that the temperature reaches the setpoint at the desired time. Only works if the thermostat is managed by the agenda plugin
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Pour une meilleure régulation il est con: For better regulation, it is advisable not to touch these coefficients because they are calculated and updated automatically during self-learning
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Cette valeur est multipliée par l’écart: This value is multiplied by the difference between the setpoint and the indoor temperature to deduce the heating time
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.État d’avancement de l’apprentissage cha: Heating learning progress status (50 indicates the end of learning)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Cette valeur est multipliée par l’écart: This value is multiplied by the difference between the setpoint and the outside temperature to deduce the heating time
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.État d’avancement de l’apprentissage de: Heating insulation learning progress (50 indicates the end of learning)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Cette valeur est multipliée par l’écart: This value is multiplied by the difference between the setpoint and the interior temperature to deduce the cooling time
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.État d’avancement de l’apprentissage fro: Cooling learning progress status  (50 indicates the end of learning)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Cette valeur est multipliée par l’écart: This value is multiplied by the difference between the setpoint and the outside temperature to deduce the cooling time
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.État d’avancement de l’apprentissage de: Cooling insulation learning progress status (50 indicates the end of learning)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Réinitialise le processus d'apprentissag: Reset the learning process. Don't forget to save after resetting to 0

info.json.Ce plugin très puissant et très complet: This very powerful and very complete plugin will allow you to finely manage the temperature of your home whether it is to heat or cool it. The plugin learns by itself over time the best way to save energy while maintaining optimal comfort in your home
